<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script><script type="text/javascript" src="http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js"></script><script type="text/javascript">stLight.options({publisher:'a8e91dea-73f7-4dff-9c98-983b42cb7c44'});</script>

        <div id="content_main">
            
            <div id="main_content_placeholder_0_ContentMainOrganic">
                <div class="body-content rtf">
                    <h2>Develop new business skills</h2>
<p>Students in the School of Business at Westwood College can choose degrees from several areas of study.&nbsp;Whether you&rsquo;re interested in <a href="/programs/school-of-business/business-administration-major-in-accounting-and-financial-management">accounting</a>, <a href="/programs/school-of-business/business-administration-major-in-marketing-management">marketing</a>, <a href="/programs/school-of-business/construction-management-associate-degree">construction management</a> or <a href="/programs/school-of-business/business-administration-major-in-healthcare-management">healthcare management</a>, Westwood has a degree program for you. To enter our School of Business is to make a decision to get the training you need to further your career.</p>
<ul class="details">
    <li class="first">
    <div class="details-content">
    <h3>Business Administration</h3>
    <ul>
        <li> associate degree </li>
        <li> available on campus and online </li>
    </ul>
    <a href="/programs/school-of-business/business-administration" class="more">details </a>
    </div>
    </li>
    <li>
    <div class="details-content">
    <h3> Business Administration: <span class="bold"> MAJOR IN ACCOUNTING</span> </h3>
    <ul>
        <li> bachelor's degree </li>
        <li> available on campus</li>
    </ul>
    <a href="/programs/school-of-business/business-administration-major-in-accounting-and-financial-management" class="more">details   </a>
    </div>
    </li>
    <li>
    <div class="details-content">
    <h3> Business Administration: <span class="bold"> MAJOR IN HEALTHCARE MANAGEMENT  </span> </h3>
    <ul>
        <li> bachelor's degree </li>
        <li> available on campus </li>
    </ul>
    <a href="/programs/school-of-business/business-administration-major-in-healthcare-management" class="more">details </a>
    </div>
    </li>
    <li>
    <div class="details-content">
    <h3> Business Administration: <span class="bold"> MAJOR IN HUMAN RESOURCE MANAGEMENT </span> </h3>
    <ul>
        <li> bachelor's degree </li>
        <li> available online</li>
    </ul>
    <a href="/programs/school-of-business/business-administration-major-in-human-resource-management" class="more">details </a>
    </div>
    </li>
    <li>
    <div class="details-content">
    <h3> Business Administration:  <span class="bold"> MAJOR IN MANAGEMENT </span> </h3>
    <ul>
        <li> bachelor's degree </li>
        <li> available on campus and online </li>
    </ul>
    <a href="/programs/school-of-business/business-administration-major-in-management" class="more">details   </a>
    </div>
    </li>
    <li>
    <div class="details-content">
    <h3> Business Administration: <span class="bold"> MAJOR IN MARKETING MANAGEMENT </span> </h3>
    <ul>
        <li> bachelor's degree </li>
        <li> available on campus and online </li>
    </ul>
    <a href="/programs/school-of-business/business-administration-major-in-marketing-management" class="more">details   </a>
    </div>
    </li>
    <li>
    <div class="details-content">
    <h3> Business Administration: <span class="bold"> MAJOR IN PROJECT MANAGEMENT </span> </h3>
    <ul>
        <li> bachelor's degree </li>
        <li> available online </li>
    </ul>
    <a href="/programs/school-of-business/business-administration-major-in-project-management" class="more">details   </a>
    </div>
    </li>
    <li>
    <div class="details-content">
    <h3><span class="bold">CONSTRUCTION MANAGEMENT </span> </h3>
    <ul>
        <li> associate degree </li>
        <li> available on campus </li>
    </ul>
    <a href="/programs/school-of-business/construction-management-associate-degree" class="more">details   </a>
    </div>
    </li>
    <li>
    <div class="details-content">
    <h3><span class="bold">CONSTRUCTION MANAGEMENT </span> </h3>
    <ul>
        <li> bachelor's degree </li>
        <li> available on campus </li>
    </ul>
    <a href="/programs/school-of-business/construction-management" class="more">details </a>
    </div>
    </li>
    <li>
    <div class="details-content">
    <h3><span class="bold">MASTER OF BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION</span></h3>
    <ul>
        <li>master's degree </li>
        <li> available on campus </li>
    </ul>
    <a href="/programs/school-of-business/master-of-business-administration" class="more">details </a></div>
    </li>
    <br />
    <h2>THE SCHOOL OF BUSINESS OPPORTUNITY</h2>
    <p>The School of Business at Westwood College focuses on real-world training and could be just the catalyst you need to spur your career growth.</p>
    <dl>
        <dt>Courses are taught by business professionals from a multitude of industries.</dt>
        <dd>Your training will include instruction on new and emerging business trends.</dd>
        <dt>Many classes are designed to be career-focused.</dt>
        <dd>You can graduate prepared to meet new challenges in your chosen field</dd>
        <dt>Your program will include opportunities to connect with local businesses. </dt>
        <dd>Relationships that develop from these encounters can lead to future career options.</dd>
        <dt>Earn your degree and work towards a new career while keeping your job. </dt>
        <dd>Our online business degree programs&nbsp;provide a more flexible way to attend classes.</dd>
    </dl>
    <br />
    <img alt="icon_map" src="/~/media/Images/images/design-assets/icons/icon_map.ashx" class="left" style="float: left; margin-right: 10px; margin-bottom: 5px;" />Westwood offers School of Business programs in California, Colorado, Georgia, Illinois and Virginia. An online learning option is also available for several of these offerings, including a <a href="/programs/school-of-business/master-of-business-administration">master of business administration (MBA) program</a> especially designed for busy professionals.<br />
    <br />
    <p>Program names, course topics and outcomes may vary by location. Not all programs available in all locations and not&nbsp;all programs are offered every term. Please see the <a href="/programs/course-catalogs" target="_blank">catalog at the campus location of your choice</a> to review full program details.
    </p>
    <p><br />
    </p>
</ul>

    <div class="module-content rtf">
        <div class="callToActionTop">
<h3>Request More Information</h3>
<p class="callToActionInfo">Our graduates receive hands-on, career-focused training. Don't wait another day; start transforming your life into the one you've always wanted.<br />
<a href="/request-information-a" title="request information" target="_self"><img class="callToActionButton" style="border: 0px solid;" alt="request information" src="/Design/static/images/calltoaction/buttonCallToAction1.gif" /></a></p>
</div>
<h3 class="callToActionBottom">Did You Know?</h3>
<p class="subParagraph">Our fast-track approach can help you earn your associate degree in as little as 17 months or your bachelor's degree in as little as three years.</p>

<div class="module module-curved simple-module first">
	<div class="module-head">
		<h2>Our Employment Pledge</h2>
		<h3>A degree of certainty</h3>
	</div>
	<div class="module-content rtf">
	    <p><a href="/why-westwood/pledge" target="_self"><img width="110" height="110" style="float: left; margin-left: 5px;  margin-right: 5px;border: 0px solid;" alt="Westwood Employment Pledge" src="/~/media/Images/images/icons/employment_pledge_110.ashx" /></a>We're so confident you'll receive the right skills to launch your career and get your first job that if you haven't found employment within six months of graduation, we'll help pay your bills. Simple as that. <a href="/why-westwood/pledge" target="_self">Learn more</a>.</p>
	</div>
</div>	

        
            


<div class="module module-curved simple-module">
	<div class="module-head">
		<h2>Westwood success</h2>
		<h3>Experience the success of our graduates</h3>
	</div>
	<div class="module-content rtf">
	    <p><a href="http://www.westwoodcollegesuccess.com" title="Westwood Success Stories" onclick="javascript: _gaq.push(['_trackPageview', '/internal/WW100']);" target="_blank"></a><a href="http://www.westwoodsuccess.com" target="_blank"><img src="/~/media/Images/images/global/ww100_sm.ashx" alt="Westwood Success" style="float: left; margin-right: 10px; margin-bottom: 5px;" /></a>Everyday students find their success at Westwood College. <a href="http://www.WestwoodSuccess.com" target="_blank">Visit WestwoodSuccess.com</a> to learn how our graduates have realized their dreams with a Westwood degree.</p>
	</div>
</div>

	    <p><img style="float: left;border: 0px solid;" alt="icon_transformation" src="/~/media/Images/images/global/icon_transformation.ashx" />Deciding on an education is one of the most important decisions you&rsquo;ll make in your life. Watch some life stories unfold and see how different choices can lead a person down two very different career paths.</p>
<p><a href="http://landing.westwood.edu/paths/index.html" title="Explore the Difference of an Education" target="_self">Explore the difference of an education. </a></p>
	</div>
